bibl.title: Manuscript, Society and Belief in Early Christian Egypt.

series.title: The Schweich Lectures of the British Academy.

bibl.note: Lecture I. The Evidence of the Papyri. - Lecture II. Nomina sacra: Origins and Significance. - Lecture III. The Character and Development of the Church. - Appendices. - Index. - Addenda.
bibl.seg: Roberts Colin H., Manuscript, Society and Belief in Early Christian Egypt. (The Schweich Lectures of the British Academy. 1977.)
London, Oxford University Press, 1979, 8°, ix-89 pp.
Lecture I. The Evidence of the Papyri. - Lecture II. Nomina sacra: Origins and Significance. - Lecture III. The Character and Development of the Church. - Appendices. - Index. - Addenda.

C.R. par Peter J. Parsons, JRS 74 (1984) pp. 254-255 (concerne aussi Colin H. Roberts and T.C. Skeat, The Birth of the Codex. London, 1983). - George D. Kilpatrick, VigChr 36 (1982) pp. 87-94. - Leslie S.B. MacCoull, Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 24 (1979-1982) pp. 151-152. - H. Crouzel, BLE 81 (1980) p. 218. - W.H.C. Frend, JEH 31 (1980) pp. 207-208. - F. Hockey, RHE 75 (1980) pp. 348-349. - T. Orlandi, VetChr 17 (1980) p. 389. - R. Price, Sobornost 2 (1980) pp. 86-88. - T.C. Skeat, JThS N.S., 31 (1980) pp. 183-186.
